title.narrative: Transfer project budget to Vietnamese clients via SNV

description.narrative:
Agriterra has been based in Vietnam since january 2016. In the first half year many new prospects have been assessed and turned into clients. This contains besides starting up missions, also starting projects together. For some clients Agriterra is facing a problem.
Due to legal reasons Agriterra cannot transfer project budgets to 4 clients in Vietnam as Agriterra is not registered as business or NGO in Vietnam. For this reason the temporary solution has been proposed to channel project budget for 4 clients: QNFU,PNEL,UBDA and DTCA, via SNV. Projects which will be covered by this transfer are:-6497-6604-6605-6606
According to our action plans and the MOU between SNV and QNFU we should reserve Euro 18,800 for all 4 clients in Quang Ninh, with below details:
QNFU= 11.500€ (Contract)
DTCA= 2250€ (Contract)
PNEL=2800€ (Contract)
UBDA=2250€ (Contract)
1st installment should be E 25,500 x 80% = E 15,040
Plus 15% of the E 20,400 for SNV overhead costs = E 2,256 So in total Agriterra should transfer to SNV VN =E 17,296
As Agriterra already has good relations with SNV vietnam and there is already a contractual relationship regarding housing and some services, channeling the project budgets via SNV is the easiest solution. SNV asks 15% on top of the channeled money for their services which are adminstrative and financial control follow-up with our clients. More info on this is in the attached file.
Make sure the carrying out of the different projects with the 4 clients runs smooth.
Admin cost. The value is summarized by year
Admin cost. The value is summarized by year
Admin cost. The value is summarized by year
